query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS scheduled_oee_reports (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  production_line_ids JSON NOT NULL,
  frequency ENUM('daily','weekly','monthly') DEFAULT 'weekly' NOT NULL,
  day_of_week INT,
  day_of_month INT,
  hour INT DEFAULT 8 NOT NULL,
  minute INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  timezone VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'Asia/Ho_Chi_Minh',
  notification_channel ENUM('telegram','slack','both') DEFAULT 'telegram' NOT NULL,
  telegram_config_id INT,
  slack_webhook_url VARCHAR(500),
  include_availability INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  include_performance INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  include_quality INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  include_comparison INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  include_trend INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  is_active INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  last_sent_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  next_scheduled_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  created_by INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_scheduled_oee_active (is_active),
  INDEX idx_scheduled_oee_next (next_scheduled_at)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bBfAdpTc8yvngq.root --database RpnsLdN3u3f6PBDr9mn7Zq --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS scheduled_oee_reports (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  production_line_ids JSON NOT NULL,
  frequency ENUM('daily','weekly','monthly') DEFAULT 'weekly' NOT NULL,
  day_of_week INT,
  day_of_month INT,
  hour INT DEFAULT 8 NOT NULL,
  minute INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  timezone VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'Asia/Ho_Chi_Minh',
  notification_channel ENUM('telegram','slack','both') DEFAULT 'telegram' NOT NULL,
  telegram_config_id INT,
  slack_webhook_url VARCHAR(500),
  include_availability INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  include_performance INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  include_quality INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  include_comparison INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  include_trend INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  is_active INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  last_sent_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  next_scheduled_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  created_by INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_scheduled_oee_active (is_active),
  INDEX idx_scheduled_oee_next (next_scheduled_at)
);
